attributes.action: introduce a mandatory minimum 5 year setence for the possesion of knives in public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the increase in knife crime the time has come to introduce a madatory minimum 5 year sentence for the possesion of knives in public places.  Maybe this way we can avoid the increase in the news headlines about this subject.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "introduce a mandatory minimum 5 year setence for the possesion of knives in public."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16535


Prime Minister's Office
